about_the_game:
"Phantom Girls: Hellish Hospital" is a story of love and horror. The story is about a loving husband who travels to an abandoned hospital to save his wife from the horror that awaits him there.

Learn the history of the cursed hospital and save your wife at any cost! But are you ready to immerse yourself in this horror?

Executed in a realistic art style, "Phantom Girls: Hellish Hospital" is a unique adult world wrapped in a deeply unsettling atmosphere. The mature storyline incorporates sexual themes with unexpected moments, weaving an exciting and complex narrative that will keep you in suspense.

"Phantom Girls: Hellish Hospital" - combines addictive gameplay, suspenseful atmosphere and eroticism. A thrilling love story, scary ghosts and constant tension await you. Get ready for an unprecedented gaming experience that pushes the boundaries of explicit entertainment.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or for viewing at work: sexual content, nudity.
The game graphically depicts sex.
All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Monterey or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

name: Phantom Girls: Hellish Hospital

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or later
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in "Phantom Girls: Hellish Hospital", an adult FPS horror game where sensuality meets horror. Make your way through explicit scenes and supernatural phenomena as you immerse yourself in a story of fear and love.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Japanese, Latvian, Lithuanian, Slovak, Slovenian, Estonian
*languages with full audio support
